tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_tracking (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50),
  gps_latitude DECIMAL,
  gps_longitude DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(20),
    last_known_location VARCHAR(100),
    last_update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    driver_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance_traveled DECIMAL(10,2),
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vehicle_id FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
  driver_id INT,
  last_known_location VARCHAR(100),
  last_known_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE drivers (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50),
  driver_license_number VARCHAR(20),
  driver_phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  driver_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE gps_data (
  gps_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  speed DECIMAL(5,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT
)

CREATE TABLE drivers (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    license_number VARCHAR(20),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance FLOAT,
    estimated_time INT
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_data (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    route_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR,
  last_known_location VARCHAR,
  last_known_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE deliveries (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  driver_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  speed_km_per_hr FLOAT,
  temperature_celsius FLOAT,
  location VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
